parameter.name: ERMA.Properties.Settings.WOW-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: ERMA.Properties.Settings.WOW Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Driver={Client Access ODBC Driver (32-bit)};system=172.16.1.51;uid=PCUTIL;dbq=CMSDATEDI TOYOTOMI WOW OIPAYFILES;dftpkglib=QGPL;languageid=ENU;pkg=QGPL/DEFAULT(IBM),2,0,1,0,512;qrystglmt=-1;cmt=0;nam=1;translate=1;ssl=0;signon=1;pwd=pcutil
